name: Trash Dash (introtogamesproduction)
description:
Trash Dash is a simplistic styled platformer game with easy controls, The goal of the game is just to go as long as you can without hitting an obstacle and dash your way through all that city trash! 

Space to jump and mouse 1 to interact with the menus in the game.

To install the game simply download the zip file, extract, run the installer and play!

I hope you enjoy the game even though at this point in time it is very basic thanks for taking a look and have a great day!

Check out the production journal here: https://www.behance.net/gallery/118429989/Trash-Dash-%28Game-Production-Journal%..
